title: [Large-Scale] Mobile-Based Remote Mathematics Education Design: Short-Intensive Course for Professional Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of core middle school mathematics concepts and experience solving job-related mathematical problems
context.additional_context: Strengthening real-time interaction using mobile learning tools in a smartphone-centric limited-technology environment

learning_goals: Participate in real-time mathematical problem-solving processes through a mobile learning application at least three times per week
Perform social interactions with peer learners at least twice per week using a mobile collaboration tool based on Transactional Distance Theory
Demonstrate the ability to analyze and solve job-related mathematical problems in a mobile environment, evidenced by a formative assessment achievement rate of over 80%

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
